CognoSpeak™ Publications

  • Ronan O'Malley, Bahman Mirheidari, Kirsty Hakrness, Markus Reuber, Annalena Venneri, Traci Walker, Heidi Christensen, and Dan Blackburn. Fully automated cognitive screening tool based on assessment of speech and language. Journal of Neurology, Neurosurgery & Psychiatry, 2020.
  • Yilin Pan, Bahman Mirheidari, Markus Reuber, Annalena Venneri, Daniel Blackburn, and Heidi Christensen. Improving detection of Alzheimer's Disease using automatic speech recognition to identify high-quality segments for more robust feature extraction. In Proc. of Interspeech, 2020.
  • Yilin Pan, Bahman Mirheidari, Zehai Tu, Ronan O'Malley, Traci Walker, Annalena Venneri, Markus Reuber, Daniel Blackburn, and Heidi Christensen. Acoustic feature extraction with interpretable deep neural network for neurodegenerative related disorder classification. In Proc. of Interspeech, 2020.
  • Bahman Mirheidari, Daniel Blackburn, Ronan O'Malley, Annalena Venneri, Traci Walker, Markus Reuber, and Heidi Christensen. Improving cognitive impairment classification by generative neural network-based feature augmentation. In Proc. of Interspeech, 2020.
  • Bahman Mirheidari, Yilin Pan, Daniel Blackburn, Ronan O'Malley, Traci Walker, Annalena Venneri, Markus Reuber, and Heidi Christensen. Data augmentation using generative networks to identify dementia. arXiv preprint arXiv:2004.05989, 2020.
  • Gareth Walker, Lee-Ann Morris, Heidi Christensen, Bahman Mirheidari, Markus Reuber, and Daniel Blackburn. Characterising spoken responses to an intelligent virtual agent by persons with mild cognitive impairment. Clinical linguistics & phonetics, 2:1–16, 2020.
  • Traci Walker, Heidi Christensen, Bahman Mirheidari, Thomas Swainston, Casey Rutten, Imke Mayer, Daniel Blackburn, and Markus Reuber. Developing an intelligent virtual agent to stratify people with cognitive complaints: A comparison of human-patient and intelligent virtual agent-patient interaction. Dementia, 19(4):1173–1188, 2020.
  • Ronan O'Malley, Eric Brook, Alice Lewis, Isobel Sonksen, Bahman Mirhedari, Annalena Venneri, Heidi Christensen, and Daniel Blackburn. 056 Exploring the feasibility of automating verbal fluency tasks for cognitive assessment: data collection and analysis. Journal of Neurology, Neurosurgery and Psychiatry, 90(12):A23, 2019.
  • Bahman Mirheidari, Daniel Blackburn, Traci Walker, Markus Reuber, and Heidi Christensen. Dementia detection using automatic analysis of conversations. Computer Speech & Language, 53:65–79, 2019.
  • Bahman Mirheidari, Yilin Pan, Traci Walker, Markus Reuber, Annalena Venneri, Daniel Blackburn, and Heidi Christensen. Detecting Alzheimer's Disease by estimating attention and elicitation path through the alignment of spoken picture descriptions with the picture prompt. arXiv preprint arXiv:1910.00515, 2019.
  • Bahman Mirheidari, Daniel Blackburn, Ronan O'Malley, Traci Walker, Annalena Venneri, Markus Reuber, and Heidi Christensen. Computational cognitive assessment: investigating the use of an intelligent virtual agent for the detection of early signs of dementia. In IEEE International Conference on Acoustics, Speech and Signal Processing (ICASSP), pages 2732–2736. IEEE, 2019.
  • Ronan O'Malley, Bahman Mirhedari, Kirsty Harkness, Markus Reuber, Annalena Venneri, Heidi Christensen, and Daniel Blackburn. 055 The digital doctor: a fully automated stratification and monitoring system for patients with memory complaints. Journal of Neurology, Neurosurgery and Psychiatry, 90(12):A23, 2019.
  • Yilin Pan, Bahman Mirheidari, Markus Reuber, Annalena Venneri, Daniel Blackburn, and Heidi Christensen. Automatic hierarchical attention neural network for detecting AD. In Proc. Interspeech, 2019.
  • Bahman Mirheidari, Daniel Blackburn, Traci Walker, Annalena Venneri, Markus Reuber, and Heidi Christensen. Detecting signs of dementia using word vector representations. In Proc. Interspeech, 2018.
  • Traci Walker, Heidi Christensen, Bahman Mirheidari, Thomas Swainston, Casey Rutten, Imke Mayer, Daniel Blackburn, and Markus Reuber. Developing an intelligent virtual agent to stratify people with cognitive complaints: A comparison of human-patient and intelligent virtual agent-patient interaction. Dementia, page 1471301218795238, 2018.
  • Bahman Mirheidari, DJ Blackburn, Kirsty Harkness, Traci Walker, Annalena Venneri, Markus Reuber, and Heidi Christensen. An avatar-based system for identifying individuals likely to develop dementia. In Proc. Interspeech, 2017.
  • Bahman Mirheidari, Daniel Blackburn, Kirsty Harkness, Traci Walker, Annalena Venneri, Markus Reuber, and Heidi Christensen. Toward the automation of diagnostic conversation analysis in patients with memory complaints. Journal of Alzheimer's Disease, 58(2):373–387, 2017.
  • D Blackburn, M Reuber, H Christensen, I Mayer, C Rutten, A Venneri, B Mirheidari, and others. An avatar to screen for cognitive impairment. Journal of the Neurological Sciences, 381:319, 2017.
  • Daniel Blackburn, Bahman Mir Mirheidari, Casey Rutten, Imke Mayer, Traci Walker, Heidi Christensen, and Markus Rueber. Po029 An avatar aid in memory clinic , 2017.
